Client

ItsOnMe is SaaS-based e-Gifting platform for small businesses. It is designed to efficiently integrate e-Gifting into the business model.

Objective

Develop product technical roadmap, educate the client on existing e-Gifting solutions, build the platform and support it during the entire system lifecycle. The founder’s vision required vendor to have expertise with SaaS systems, on-the-fly video processing, and native mobile app development.

Solution

Achievion selected a Java-based Broadleaf E-commerce engine as the backbone of the platform. Our engineers designed video processing protocol to enable customers upload and share video messages from all popular platforms – Windows, Mac, iOS, and Android. Achievion mobile team also built native mobile apps to allow ItsOnMe users send e-Gift Cards anytime from any point in the world via email, Facebook, and phone.

Result

The outcome was a platform that delivered revolutionary electronic gifting ideas leveraging latest technology trends.
